English: How intimate do you think the given tweet is?
Amharic: How intimate do you think the given tweet is?
Esperanto: How intimate do you think the given tweet is?
Kurdish: How intimate do you think the given tweet is?
French: À quel point pensez-vous que ce «tweet» est intime ?
Spanish: ¿Qué nivel de intimidad crees que tiene este tuit?
Italian: Quanto pensi che sia intimo questo tweet?
Dutch: How intiem is deze tweet volgens jou?
Portuguese: Quão íntimo você acha que esse tweet é?
Chinese: 你觉得这一条推特有多亲密?

English: In this study, you will rate the intimacy of 50 tweets
Amharic: In this study, you will rate the intimacy of 50 tweets
Esperanto: In this study, you will rate the intimacy of 50 tweets
Kurdish: In this study, you will rate the intimacy of 50 tweets
French: Dans cette étude, vous évaluerez l'intimité de 50 «tweets».
Spanish: En este estudio, se le darán 50 tuits y su trabajo es indicar el nivel de intimidad de cada tuit.
Italian: In qusto studio si dovrà annotare il livello di intimità di 50 tweets.
Dutch: In deze studie vragen we je 50 tweets te beoordelen
Portuguese: Nesse estudo, você vai avaliar a intimidade de 50 tweets.
Chinese: 在这一项研究中，你的任务是对50条推特的亲密度进行打分

English: Intimate tweets can be discussing personal issues or said in a more personal tone. Non-intimate tweets can be discussing public issues or technical terms.
Amharic: Intimate tweets can be discussing personal issues or said in a more personal tone. Non-intimate tweets can be discussing public issues or technical terms.
Esperanto: Intimate tweets can be discussing personal issues or said in a more personal tone. Non-intimate tweets can be discussing public issues or technical terms.
Kurdish: Intimate tweets can be discussing personal issues or said in a more personal tone. Non-intimate tweets can be discussing public issues or technical terms.
French: Les «tweets» intimes peuvent discuter de problèmes personnels ou être dits sur un ton plus personnel. Les «tweet» non-intimes peuvent discuter de problèmes d'intérêt publique ou de termes techniques.
Spanish: Los tuits íntimos pueden tratar temas personales o expresarse en un tono más personal. Los tuits no íntimos pueden tratar asuntos públicos o temas técnicos.
Italian: I tweet intimi riguardano questioni personali o essere detti in un tono più personale. I tweet non intimi riguardano questioni pubbliche o questioni tecniche.
Dutch: Intieme tweets zijn tweets die persoonlijke dingen bespreken, of een persoonlijke toon hebben. Niet-intieme tweets kunnen algemene dingen of technische zaken beschrijven
Portuguese: Tweets íntimos podem discutir assuntos pessoais ou utilizar um tom mais pessoal. Tweets não-íntimos podem discutir questões públicas ou termos técnicos.
Chinese: 一条“亲密”的推特往往是在讨论一些比较私人的话题，或者在用一种相对更私人化的语气进行表达。一条“不亲密”的推特则往往是在讨论一些公开的议题，或者是一些技术性的内容，等等。

English: This is a test question, please select [test_question_choice].
Amharic: This is a test question, please select [test_question_choice].
Esperanto: This is a test question, please select [test_question_choice].
Kurdish: This is a test question, please select [test_question_choice].
French: Ceci est une question test, veuillez sélectionner [test_question_choice].
Spanish: Esta es una pregunta de prueba, seleccione [test_question_choice].
Italian: Questa è una domanda di prova, seleziona [test_question_choice] per favore.
Dutch: Dit is een testvraag, selecteer het geval [test_question_choice].
Portuguese: Esta é uma pergunta de teste, selecione a opção [test_question_choice], por favor.
Chinese: 这是一个测试问题，请选择 [test_question_choice]。

Spanish: Percepción de la intimidad de los tuits
Dutch: Perceptie van intimiteit van de Tweet
Chinese: 对于推特亲密度的感知

English: In this study, you will be given 50 tweets in English and you will be asked to answer how intimate do you think each of them is using a score from 1-5. You might see offensive or sexual content in this study. You should be able to finish this study in less than 10 minutes.
Amharic: In this study, you will be given 50 tweets in English and you will be asked to answer how intimate do you think each of them is using a score from 1-5. You might see offensive or sexual content in this study. You should be able to finish this study in less than 10 minutes.
Esperanto: In this study, you will be given 50 tweets in English and you will be asked to answer how intimate do you think each of them is using a score from 1-5. You might see offensive or sexual content in this study. You should be able to finish this study in less than 10 minutes.
Kurdish: In this study, you will be given 50 tweets in English and you will be asked to answer how intimate do you think each of them is using a score from 1-5. You might see offensive or sexual content in this study. You should be able to finish this study in less than 10 minutes.
French: Dans cette étude, vous recevrez 50 «tweets» en français et vous devrez indiquer à quel point vous pensez-vous que chacun d'eux est intime en utilisant une échelle de valeurs de 1 à 5. Vous pourriez voir du contenu offensif ou sexuel dans cette étude. Vous devriez être capable de terminer cette étude en moins de 10 minutes.
Spanish: En este estudio, se le darán 50 tuits en español y se le pedirá que responda qué nivel de intimidad cree que tiene cada uno de ellos, utilizando una puntuación del 1 al 5. Es posible que haya contenido ofensivo o sexual. Debería poder terminar este estudio en menos de 10 minutos.
Italian: In questo studio, ti verranno dati 50 tweet in italiano e ti verrà chiesto di annotare il livello di intimità, utilizzando un punteggio da 1 a 5. Potresti vedere contenuti offensivi o sessuali in questo studio. Dovresti riuscire a finire questo studio in meno di 10 minuti.
Dutch: In deze studie worden je 50 tweets in het Nederlands getoond, en zullen we je vragen hoe inteem je elke tweet vindt, met een schaal van 1 - 5. Het zou kunnen dat je aanstotelijke of sexueel getinte dingen ziet. De studie zou niet langer moeten duren dan 10 minuten.
Portuguese: Nesse estudo, você receberá 50 tweets em Português e você terá que responder quão íntimo você acha cada um deles usando uma pontuação entre 1-5. Você talvez veja conteúdo ofensivo ou sexual nesse estudo. Você deve ser capaz de finalizar esse estudo em menos de 10 minutos.
Chinese: 在这一项研究中，你需要阅读50条推特并对其中每一条的亲密度进行打分。分数为1-5分，1分为完全不亲密，5分为非常亲密。你也许会看到一些有冒犯性的或者比较色情的内容。完成这项研究的时间一般不超过10分钟。
